title: It Is, Once Again, Pizza Time with Shredder's Revenge
description:
We're serving up game criticism on a half shell and trashing like a million Foot Clan conscripts as we discuss TMNT: Shredder's Revenge, Tribute's modern take on Konami's classic beat-em-up series.

Also: Mailbag's full! Let's dump it on out. Also discussed: Fall Guys, Fortnite, Yakuza 0, Rogue Legacy 2, Pokemon Shield, Five Dates
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Chris Plante, Justin McElroy, Russ Frushtick, Griffin McElroy)
